page.title: 07Wellesbourne, Warwickshire.
page.content: {N.B.The majority of Wellesbourne, {including the old village,is sited out {of this D-block. } Formerly a small village grouped around the church, Wellesbourne is now a sprawling, dormitory housing estate with few facilities. The portion that falls within this D-block is made up of 1930's Council houses and late 1960's _ early 1970's private housing. There is a small,thriving shopping precinct with Post Office, a chemist, a greengrocer, a small supermarket,a DIY shop,a Chinese Take-away,a children's clothes shop and a bank. These shops are used for convenience shopping the bulk being done in nearby towns. There is a small lending library. The only Doctor's Surgery and Clinic in the area is situated near the shops and library.
